policy.name: Require owner
policy.description: Policy applied to archetypes, requiring archetyped objects to have an owner.
policy.documentation:
This policy is meant to be applied (assigned) to archetypes. When applied, the archetyped objects are required to have an owner. Objects with no owner are marked with "Unowned" mark.
NOTE: This policy can only be applied to archetypes. Support for application directly to affected objects (roles, applications) is likely to come later.
(ISO27001/A.5.1,ISO27001/A.5.2,ISO27001/A.5.9,ISO27001/A.5.36)
